## Description {#details}

Thread-safe allocator adaptor.

Uses a spin lock on the assumption that contention here is extremely rare.

TODO: Using a spin lock on every allocation can be quite expensive when contention is high. Since this is mainly used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/specificbumpptrallocator">SpecificBumpPtrAllocator</a>, it&#39;d be better to have a specific thread-safe <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> implementation that only use a fair lock when allocating a new slab but otherwise using atomic and be lock-free.

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/threadsafeallocator-h">ThreadSafeAllocator.h</a>.
